GOD.content: Abraham’s “Here I am” requires that he renounces family loyalties
GOD.linkedContent: Abraham’s “Here I am” requires that he renounces family loyalties

GOD.content: filiation of impossible filiations: Kafka & Abraham, their spectral fathers, in scene of forgiveness, literature & secrecy
GOD.linkedContent: filiation of impossible filiations: Kafka & Abraham, their spectral fathers, in scene of forgiveness, literature & secrecy

GT.content: nothing can happen w/out family & w/out economy, but neither can anything happen in family, family in sealed enclosure of absolutely restricted economy, w/out chrematistic vertigo
GT.linkedContent: nothing can happen w/out family & w/out economy, but neither can anything happen in family, family in sealed enclosure of absolutely restricted economy, w/out chrematistic vertigo

FK.content: religion appropriates indemnification of all “proper,” all property: the letter, blood and soil, family, nation
FK.linkedContent: religion appropriates indemnification of all “proper,” all property: the letter, blood and soil, family, nation

H.content: foreigner can be a parricide only when in the family
H.linkedContent: foreigner can be a parricide only when in the family

H.content: the right to hospitality commits a household, a line of descent, a family
H.linkedContent: the right to hospitality commits a household, a line of descent, a family

PP.content: plus tard, dans le même tissu, dans les mêmes textes, nous tirerons d’autres fils, et de nouveau les même pour voir s‘y ourdir ou dénouer d’autres desseins
PP.linkedContent: plus tard, dans le même tissu, dans les mêmes textes, nous tirerons d’autres fils, et de nouveau les même pour voir s‘y ourdir ou dénouer d’autres desseins

PP.content: Plato rehearses “family scene” while also trying to master, to hide it, because it demands difference
PP.linkedContent: Plato rehearses “family scene” while also trying to master, to hide it, because it demands difference

PAS.content: to say viens to a unique word (parole), somewhat plural (un singulier sauf à être plurielle), to say “Come” to her, that word, is to sacrifice right to call (appeler) another and say you to him [?]
PAS.linkedContent: to say viens to a unique word (parole), somewhat plural (un singulier sauf à être plurielle), to say “Come” to her, that word, is to sacrifice right to call (appeler) another and say you to him [?]

PAS.content: Blanchot’s tutoieing (viens) breaks w/ indiscreet familiarity, not negative theology, but describes its law, its jurisdiction, its perversion > can say toi w/out tutoieing [& reverse]
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot’s tutoieing (viens) breaks w/ indiscreet familiarity, not negative theology, but describes its law, its jurisdiction, its perversion > can say toi w/out tutoieing [& reverse]

T.content: ear-vulva, hymen, vesta, vestibule, hearth, familial
T.linkedContent: ear-vulva, hymen, vesta, vestibule, hearth, familial

SH.content: poetry, literature, art, experience of the mask, an intense familiarity w/ ineluctable originarity of specter = ineluctable loss of origin > spectral errancy of words not an accident
SH.linkedContent: poetry, literature, art, experience of the mask, an intense familiarity w/ ineluctable originarity of specter = ineluctable loss of origin > spectral errancy of words not an accident

FWT.content: fixed model of oedipal theory in Lacan & Freud > stable father, irreplaceable mother; transformation of family would transform psychoanalysis
FWT.linkedContent: fixed model of oedipal theory in Lacan & Freud > stable father, irreplaceable mother; transformation of family would transform psychoanalysis

FWT.content: psychoanalysis always wanted to be a psychoanalysis of families
FWT.linkedContent: psychoanalysis always wanted to be a psychoanalysis of families

FWT.content: transhistoricity of family bond, instituted, terribly overdetermined, will be diabolically complicated > always be “something of a family” [millennia from now]
FWT.linkedContent: transhistoricity of family bond, instituted, terribly overdetermined, will be diabolically complicated > always be “something of a family” [millennia from now]

FWT.content: persistence of some ordering around family does not produce a determinable figure
FWT.linkedContent: persistence of some ordering around family does not produce a determinable figure

FWT.content: [Derrida prefers not to get trapped btwn naturalism/constructivism] differance btwn psyché & genetico-biological laws > always something of a familial bond around birth, impossible to erase “birth,” a certain geneticism, perhaps birth is question of future, of arrival
FWT.linkedContent: [Derrida prefers not to get trapped btwn naturalism/constructivism] differance btwn psyché & genetico-biological laws > always something of a familial bond around birth, impossible to erase “birth,” a certain geneticism, perhaps birth is question of future, of arrival

FWT.content: birth always familial but will come to seem less “natural” [re: “rented belly” (utero in affitto)]
FWT.linkedContent: birth always familial but will come to seem less “natural” [re: “rented belly” (utero in affitto)]

OTO.content: the living on of an ageless virgin mother (living long enough to bury her child), & the already dead father > logic of glas, and obsequence [one finds this in Christ’s family]
OTO.linkedContent: the living on of an ageless virgin mother (living long enough to bury her child), & the already dead father > logic of glas, and obsequence [one finds this in Christ’s family]

POOF.content: familiarity (oikeiótēs, in Plato’s Lysis) (being-at-home, being-close-to oneself) links friendship w/ laws & logics of universalization, ethics, law, right, equality, equity, democracy
POOF.linkedContent: familiarity (oikeiótēs, in Plato’s Lysis) (being-at-home, being-close-to oneself) links friendship w/ laws & logics of universalization, ethics, law, right, equality, equity, democracy

POOF.content: in Menexenus, solid friendship (reconciliation) based on actual kinship (suggéneia), on homogeneity, homophilia, solid/firm affinity (bébaion) stemming from birth, native community, syngenealogy: this is a phantasm, what Joyce calls in Ulysses, re: the father, a ‘legal fiction’
POOF.linkedContent: in Menexenus, solid friendship (reconciliation) based on actual kinship (suggéneia), on homogeneity, homophilia, solid/firm affinity (bébaion) stemming from birth, native community, syngenealogy: this is a phantasm, what Joyce calls in Ulysses, re: the father, a ‘legal fiction’

POOF.content: eugenicism (eugéneia) as authochtony, proper birth, homage to earth & mother go hand in hand with fraternization: an equality of birth compatible w/ aristocracy
POOF.linkedContent: eugenicism (eugéneia) as authochtony, proper birth, homage to earth & mother go hand in hand with fraternization: an equality of birth compatible w/ aristocracy

POOF.content: logic of testimony, becoming-proof of a testimony that should never be equivalent to proof: its privileged place—kinship > in Menexenus, we survivors are witnesses that we belong to the same race, fervor of heir at funeral oration, supplementary proof: “we say so, and that is enough”
POOF.linkedContent: logic of testimony, becoming-proof of a testimony that should never be equivalent to proof: its privileged place—kinship > in Menexenus, we survivors are witnesses that we belong to the same race, fervor of heir at funeral oration, supplementary proof: “we say so, and that is enough”

POOF.content: Schmitt: friend originally meant only friend of blood, genealogical bond
POOF.linkedContent: Schmitt: friend originally meant only friend of blood, genealogical bond

TB.content: one can think maturation of seed as a geneticist/vitalist metaphor, this would support genealogical/parental code > or, one can invert/overturn order, “metaphorical catastrophe”: only understand “family,” “life” by way of language & its sur-vival, [this reversal is operated expressly by Benjamin?]
TB.linkedContent: one can think maturation of seed as a geneticist/vitalist metaphor, this would support genealogical/parental code > or, one can invert/overturn order, “metaphorical catastrophe”: only understand “family,” “life” by way of language & its sur-vival, [this reversal is operated expressly by Benjamin?]

DPi.content: re: “filiations,” it is very often difficult to separate familial dramaturgy, also that of sexual differences (man/woman, father/son, mother/son, brother/brother) in question of DP
DPi.linkedContent: re: “filiations,” it is very often difficult to separate familial dramaturgy, also that of sexual differences (man/woman, father/son, mother/son, brother/brother) in question of DP

DPi.content: blood flows, blood disappears (lethal injection), blood that flows is both spilt blood & blood of genealogy, filiation, father & son
DPi.linkedContent: blood flows, blood disappears (lethal injection), blood that flows is both spilt blood & blood of genealogy, filiation, father & son

DPi.content: fraternal filiation as debt, as being condemned > fraternal duty to pay ransom: to acquit oneself of a debt [follows Benveniste here: ghilde, Geld, damnum]
DPi.linkedContent: fraternal filiation as debt, as being condemned > fraternal duty to pay ransom: to acquit oneself of a debt [follows Benveniste here: ghilde, Geld, damnum]

DST.content: imprint and caesura, sharp-edged signature (empreinte et césure, la signature aiguë), interrupts most powerful filiations > ineluctably: when tradition can’t secure what it repeats as its own traditionality (exemplarity, repetition, identification, imitation)
DST.linkedContent: imprint and caesura, sharp-edged signature (empreinte et césure, la signature aiguë), interrupts most powerful filiations > ineluctably: when tradition can’t secure what it repeats as its own traditionality (exemplarity, repetition, identification, imitation)

IW.content: [vis-à-vis Cohen] Judeo-Protestant Platonism or world logocentrism made spiritual families possible, genealogy w/out limit, general economy (oikonomia, oikos as the law itself) > spiritual mondialisation: logos, spirit, idealism as moral conscience of philosophy & science
IW.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Cohen] Judeo-Protestant Platonism or world logocentrism made spiritual families possible, genealogy w/out limit, general economy (oikonomia, oikos as the law itself) > spiritual mondialisation: logos, spirit, idealism as moral conscience of philosophy & science

PSSS.content: will theater of psychoanalysis always be royal family, patriarchal, heterosexual? will it always treat sexual difference as binary opposition?
PSSS.linkedContent: will theater of psychoanalysis always be royal family, patriarchal, heterosexual? will it always treat sexual difference as binary opposition?

PSSS.content: psychoanalysis only “science” that intrinsically involves the proper name of its founder, a transferential filiation it claims to be able to analyze
PSSS.linkedContent: psychoanalysis only “science” that intrinsically involves the proper name of its founder, a transferential filiation it claims to be able to analyze

HST.content: exemplary substitution, child substitution (steal a child & replace w/ another), irreplaceable substitution > if so: every substitution recalls child substitution (the child is the first substitute)
HST.linkedContent: exemplary substitution, child substitution (steal a child & replace w/ another), irreplaceable substitution > if so: every substitution recalls child substitution (the child is the first substitute)

C.content: family resemblance removes none [of the 127 coffins] from itself, from the absolute secret, from definitive detachment that isolates/ab-solves outside series
C.linkedContent: family resemblance removes none [of the 127 coffins] from itself, from the absolute secret, from definitive detachment that isolates/ab-solves outside series

C.content: not one (pas un seul) must be forgotten if one wants to see or touch something of the group (genealogy or even reproduction feigned)
C.linkedContent: not one (pas un seul) must be forgotten if one wants to see or touch something of the group (genealogy or even reproduction feigned)

C.content: little princeps coffin has no relationship w/ family > and yet, in secret, in an immemorial past that was never present, he engendered this family
C.linkedContent: little princeps coffin has no relationship w/ family > and yet, in secret, in an immemorial past that was never present, he engendered this family

AD.content: even if feminine alterity is “hospitable welcome par excellence,” even if she’s not a man, she remains human: woman w/out “height” of face, not most high: her familiarity accomplishes “the en-ergy of separation” [?]
AD.linkedContent: even if feminine alterity is “hospitable welcome par excellence,” even if she’s not a man, she remains human: woman w/out “height” of face, not most high: her familiarity accomplishes “the en-ergy of separation” [?]

OG.content: Rousseau [like Aristotle, cf. BSi pp. 343-47] imagines a time when family is the only social structure—no language but that of gesture
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau [like Aristotle, cf. BSi pp. 343-47] imagines a time when family is the only social structure—no language but that of gesture

SPEC.content: [Freud’s speculation on Ernst] needs no witness, no counter-testimony has weight before this teleological auto-institution
SPEC.linkedContent: [Freud’s speculation on Ernst] needs no witness, no counter-testimony has weight before this teleological auto-institution

SPEC.content: net (filet) is in place, one pulls on a string (fil), getting a hand, foot, caught: c’est un lasso ou un lacet > Freud caught himself in advance; rapporté différé (deferred overlapping) > describing in advance scene of its own description
SPEC.linkedContent: net (filet) is in place, one pulls on a string (fil), getting a hand, foot, caught: c’est un lasso ou un lacet > Freud caught himself in advance; rapporté différé (deferred overlapping) > describing in advance scene of its own description

SPEC.content: an abyss of more than one generation [Freud & Ernst] (also said about computers), an a priori of an aftereffect (d’un après-coup) [Derrida doing this too?] > formal structure se donne à lire once objects can substitute for each other (laying bare substitutive structure itself)
SPEC.linkedContent: an abyss of more than one generation [Freud & Ernst] (also said about computers), an a priori of an aftereffect (d’un après-coup) [Derrida doing this too?] > formal structure se donne à lire once objects can substitute for each other (laying bare substitutive structure itself)

SPEC.content: several families (in French analytic movement) bear same name [Freud’s name?] w/out knowing it [via Marie Bonaparte; “au moment où on croit décacheter (unsealed) un testament”]
SPEC.linkedContent: several families (in French analytic movement) bear same name [Freud’s name?] w/out knowing it [via Marie Bonaparte; “au moment où on croit décacheter (unsealed) un testament”]

SPEC.content: condition of filiation, mid-mourning (demi-deuil) [see “Ja ou le faux-bond”]: introjection and/or incorporation: la barre entre et et/ou ou > structurally as necessary as it is necessarily impure
SPEC.linkedContent: condition of filiation, mid-mourning (demi-deuil) [see “Ja ou le faux-bond”]: introjection and/or incorporation: la barre entre et et/ou ou > structurally as necessary as it is necessarily impure

SPEC.content: that which entraps speculation: murderous, mournful, jealous, guilty identifications [re: Freud’s relation to death of his & Ernst’s younger brother] > rigorous stricture, legacy & jealousy of a repetition (already jealous of itself) pull its [fort:da’s] strings (tirent les fils) more or less strictly > scene of writing becomes auto-bio-thanato-hetero-graphic
SPEC.linkedContent: that which entraps speculation: murderous, mournful, jealous, guilty identifications [re: Freud’s relation to death of his & Ernst’s younger brother] > rigorous stricture, legacy & jealousy of a repetition (already jealous of itself) pull its [fort:da’s] strings (tirent les fils) more or less strictly > scene of writing becomes auto-bio-thanato-hetero-graphic

SPEC.content: all the interlacings of fort:da, tout ce qui s’envoi in graphics of repetition that dislocates summary “triangle” > le trait oedipien n’est qu’une rection pour le fil conducteur de la bobine [Oedipus most narrowly restricted effects of above repetition’s graphics]
SPEC.linkedContent: all the interlacings of fort:da, tout ce qui s’envoi in graphics of repetition that dislocates summary “triangle” > le trait oedipien n’est qu’une rection pour le fil conducteur de la bobine [Oedipus most narrowly restricted effects of above repetition’s graphics]

SPEC.content: as if one were pulling this nebulous matrix, w/ disseminations w/out return, by only one of its string (fils), where matricial mother would be only what she is > for what it means to write oedipally, cf. Glas, which concerns itself w/ only strings/sons (fils), with gash (balafre) and demi-deuil in affectations of proper surname
SPEC.linkedContent: as if one were pulling this nebulous matrix, w/ disseminations w/out return, by only one of its string (fils), where matricial mother would be only what she is > for what it means to write oedipally, cf. Glas, which concerns itself w/ only strings/sons (fils), with gash (balafre) and demi-deuil in affectations of proper surname

SPEC.content: whatever becomes too familiar can be suspected of jealously guarding a secret [re: Aristophanes’ speech in Symposium]
SPEC.linkedContent: whatever becomes too familiar can be suspected of jealously guarding a secret [re: Aristophanes’ speech in Symposium]
